message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $180 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $150.
